name: Plantation
description: A large agricultural estate focused on cash crops creates wealth and influence through intensive labor. The vast land holdings provide economic power, while the labor-intensive nature creates social and economic tensions.
atmosphere: Vast fields of cash crops stretch to the horizon while workers tend the valuable plants under watchful supervision. The main house overlooks the agricultural operations as processing facilities handle the harvest. The air carries growing crops, hard labor, and economic opportunity. Wealth built on intensive agriculture.
